title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Upper Shelf and Neo-Classical Motifs on Rounded Corners, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Upper Shelf and Neo-Classical Motifs on Rounded Corners
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right: Sideboard; at left corner of image near decorative motifs: inlay; in graphite, lower right of sheet: This [?], and across bottom edge, center: 6'-0" long
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong sideboard with 6 straight tapering legs; at front, 3 drawers arranged in 2 rows, flanked by rounded corners with inlaid neo-classical motifs: patera medallions suspended on tied ribbons and bell flower garlands; upper shelf supported by backsplash and 2 front columns with volutes.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Upper Shelf and Neo-Classical Motifs on Rounded Corners, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-52
